# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input)
    wrapped_text = ""
    line_length = 0
    for word in words
        if line_length + length(word) > text_width
            wrapped_text *= "\n$word "
            line_length = length(word) + 1
        else
            wrapped_text *= "$word "
            line_length += length(word) + 1
        end
    end
    return wrapped_text
end
```

Example:
```julia
text = "This is a long example sentence that needs wrapping"
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text, text_width=10)
println(wrapped_text)
```

```
long 
example 
sentence 
that needs 
wrapping 
```
